releases.title: The Ecclesiastical Tapes
releases.coverArtAlt: Two robed figures playing instruments at sunset with apocalyptic skies and inexplicable shepherds' staffs
releases.description: We found religion. Or maybe the whiskey finally found us. Either way, we traded our bar stools for shepherd's staffs and recorded eight tracks that answer the eternal question: 'What if prophets, but make it rock?' Features 100% more robes than our previous work. May contain traces of actual musical competence. Light that dumpster fire and join us for the most confusing career pivot since that time we tried yacht rock.

releases.coverArtAlt: Basement Tapes album cover with vintage cassette tape aesthetic
releases.description: Recorded on equipment we found in a dumpster. Seven tracks of raw, unpolished chaos from our humble beginnings. Lo-fi before it was cool.

releases.title: The Empty Room
